pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption: This time-lapse video captures a powerful thunderstorm at night. The primary motion consists of dramatic flashes of lightning that repeatedly illuminate a massive cloud formation from within, revealing its turbulent structure against a starry sky. In the distance, the dark silhouettes of mountains and the faint glow of city lights are visible on the horizon.
